1 velg saved project or image fil i nero.
2 søk i:simpson hit and run.
filtype:velg "image files "nrg,iso,cue"
filnavn:flt-har1
velg åpne og brenn din første cd.
repiter til du har 3 cder.(har1,har2 og har 3)
3 innstaler.
4 dra over crack på cd 1 i download mappen til den mappen der spillet ligger (i programfiler...?) erstatt o.s.v velg ja.ferdig!!!!

How to install:

Mount the BIN-files with DAEMON TOOLS. To view the BIN-files press all files at the bottom in Daemon Tools. First mount the first BIN-file, and a new window will pop up. Press install game. Later in the installaton it will ask you to insert the second CD. Mount the 2 secon BIN-file and continue installation. Do the same with the 3 BIN-file. NOTE: Choose NO when your asked to install directx 8.1. 

When you are done installing trying to play the game it will say that you have to insert(mount) CD 1.  Do that and the same window should pop up again but here take the "Crack" and Copy the file and Paste it in the game directory which should be something like this:
C:\Program Files\Vivendi Universal Games\The Simpsons Hit & Run. "Will you replace the following file..." Press YES. 

Enjoy!

(Im not so good explaining, but i hope you understood)

Crack: m0005.gamecopyworld.com/games/pc_the_simpsons_hr.shtml 
Take the crack at the bottom, named as:The Simpsons: Hit & Run v1.0 [ENGLISH] No-CD/Fixed EXE #1
